Cross Promotion Services by ReadyGraph

Contextual Insights

ReadyGraph delivers curated stories based on user preferences from every topic imaginable. Our users count on us to deliver them relevant and important news that matters in their lives.

ReadyGraph curates and delivers over 4,000,000 daily and weekly email digests per month. Partnering with over 30,000 websites, ReadyGraph delivers requested media on consumerâ€™s terms.

Contextual Insights

Contextual Insights

In todays digital advertising climate, the relevance of your message is more important than ever.
ReadyGraph knows users better than any other media on the planet. Our users share information with us that helps us enhance their experiences by delivering highly relevant messages to their inboxes every day. ReadyGraph users welcome our information because we pride ourselves on providing content that our users actually want to see. For advertisers this means that your message will always be in front of the right consumer. No one gets closer to the center of the bulls-eye than ReadyGraph. Don't believe us? Schedule a test campaign to see how powerful our context based native advertising solutions can be.


Every User, Every Device

Handheld

Do you want your ads to appear only on mobile devices in New York City? ReadyGraph's technology allows you to target who you want, where you wantthem, on any device. Maybe you only want to select certain cities, or target by gender.

ReadyGraph's account team will work with you to accomplish evenyour most demanding targeting requests.

Desktop

Maybe you want your customers to interact with you in a way that empowers them to get through the funnel as quickly as possible. Whether you choose to only target desktop users, or you spread your campaign across devices, ReadyGraph is able to get you in front of any audience on any device with packages designed tomake the best use of your budget.

You see results, your customers see your message as relevant andwelcomed.

Tablet

Research has shown that people who use tablets to access their content and connect to the internet are often some of the most affluent consumers on the web. Our emails are optimized to fit on any device regardless of brand or screen size. ReadyGraph has the ability to put your message on any device, targeting only the consumers who you want, while maintaining a high end user experience. Reach who you want when you want to in a way that's relevant and welcomed.


Digital Media Forever

Just like a newspaper, an advertisement placed through ReadyGraph's native email advertising platform stays with consumers forever. Maybe they don't have a need for your product right now but plan on revisiting in the future to take advantage of your personalized and relevant offer. ReadyGraph offers some of the most demanded media in the world, and often times just because something isn't right now, doesn't mean it isn't right.

ReadyGraph tracks opens, clicks, and has a host of custom analytic options depending on what business objectives advertisers want to accomplish.
